Package org.jetel.ctl

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CodePieceExtractor.PositionedCodeVisitorFactory<T extends CodePieceExtractor.PositionedCodeVisitor>  
    ErrorMessage.Detail
    An interface providing additional information about the error.
    ITLCompiler  
    SourceCodeProvider
    This interface is used by Readers that can provide the complete source code of the transformation.
    SyntheticNodeVisitor
    Interface defines visit methods for synthetic AST nodes.
    TLContextProvider
    Interface for the CTL compiler providing access to the external resources of a transformation graph than can be referenced from the CTL code such as metadata, sequences or lookup tables.
    TransformLangParserConstants
    Token literal values and constants.
    TransformLangParserTreeConstants  
    TransformLangParserVisitor  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ASTBuilder
    Implementation of semantic checking for CTL compiler.
    CodePieceExtractor
    Utility class for easy extraction of specific pieces of code from CTL code.
    CodePieceExtractor.PositionedCodeVisitor  
    CodePieceExtractor.PositionedString
    Returns pieces of input string indexed by start line, start column, end line, end column.
    CodePieceExtractor.SyntacticPositionedString
    Enhanced PositionedString that can use SyntacticPosition to index the input string.
    CTLAbstractTransform
    Base class of all CTL transform classes.
    CTLAbstractTransformAdapter
    Base class of all CTL transform classes.
    CTLExpressionEvaluator
    Represents a tool for evaluation of simple CTL expressions.
    ErrorLocation
    An error location within CTL code.
    ErrorMessage
    An error message within CTL code.
    ErrorReporter  
    ExpParser  
    FindFunctionVisitor
    Function declaration scanner.
    FlowControl
    Control flow checking implementation.
    GraphContextProvider
    Implementation of the context provider for transformation graph.
    GraphParametersTLCompiler
    A custom TLCompiler that also detects unset required graph parameters.
    JavaCharStream
    An implementation of interface CharStream, where the stream is assumed to contain only ASCII characters (with java-like unicode escape processing).
    JJTTransformLangParserState  
    ListFieldWrapper<T>
    The wrapper converts CharSequences into Strings.
    LiteralParser  
    MapFieldWrapper<V>
    The wrapper converts CharSequences into Strings.
    MetadataErrorDetail
    ErrorMessage.Detail used to indicate missing fields.
    NavigatingVisitor
    Default implementation of visitor pattern for AST tree generated by TransformLangParser.
    ParserHelper
    Class for management of symbols and symbol tables.
    ProblemReporter
    Collector of diagnostic messages.
    SimpleCharStream
    An implementation of interface CharStream, where the stream is assumed to contain only ASCII characters (without unicode processing).
    SourceStringReader  
    Stack  
    SyntacticPosition
    Specific position in CTL code represented by a pair [line, column].
    TLCompiler
    CTL frontend of compiler.
    TLCompilerDescription  
    TLCompilerFactory  
    TLUtils  
    Token
    Describes the input token stream.
    TransformLangExecutor
    CTL interpreter implementation.
    TransformLangParser  
    TransformLangParserTokenManager
    Token Manager.
    TranslatingVisitor
    Visitor with support for AST rewriting.
    TypeChecker  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ErrorMessage.ErrorLevel  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EndOfFileException
    This exception is thrown by TransformLangParser.unknownToken() method in case it parses EOF token.
    ErrorMessageException
    This exception bears one or list of ErrorMessage object.
    ParseException
    This exception is thrown when parse errors are encountered.
    TransformLangExecutorRuntimeException  
    UnterminatedStringException
    Exception thrown by token manager in case an unterminated string literal is found during parsing.
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    TokenMgrError
    Token Manager Error.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    CTLEntryPoint
    Use this annotation for methods that should be recognized as CTL entry points by the CTL-to-Java compiler.
